data.name: Babbage Halbonauts
data.description: A Halbonaut is guided by a HAL Turing or other central controller. Its Babbage circuitry, (mechanical analogs of electronic transistors) withstands high radiation and temperature.

data.name: Biomechs
data.description: Biomechatronics integrates biology, mechanics, and electronics for improved respiration, vision, metabolism, and artificial limbs.

data.name: Botany Bay Convicts
data.description: The New Botany Bay Penal Colony is the answer to severe labor shortages in space.

data.name: Boyle Engineering Collective
data.description: Mars Nativism protects the rights of the First Hundred and native-born against those born on Earth.

data.name: Calypso 2 Seed Sail
data.description: Named after the legendary oceanographic research vessel used by Jacques-Ives Cousteau. A closed eco-system allows low mass. Its mission is to spread life to other worlds.

data.name: Heavy Water Survivalists
data.description: Libertarians, survivalists, and doomsayers convinced that the Earth is kaput. They drink heavy water (D2O) to improve radiation resistance.

data.name: House of Saud
data.description: The ruling royal family of Saudi Arabia is the richest dynasty in history.

data.name: Juiced Cosmonauts
data.description: Drugs hold against the harsh conditions.

data.name: Lloyd's Salvage Co.
data.description: Policy of replacing corporate transactions with individual ones, enabled by reputation tracking and easily-created microsatellite infrastructure.

data.name: Malcolm
data.description: An eccentric tycoon determined to make his mark in the High Frontier.

data.name: Microgravity Pantrophists
data.description: Pantropy is the practice of adapting to an environment rather than altering it, by use of gene-spliced biological symbionts.

data.name: Programmable Matter
data.description: Changes its physical properties (shape, density, moduli, conductivity, or optical properties) in accordance with autonomous programming.

data.name: Rock Rats Miners' Union
data.description: Human-cobot teams optimize productivity in extreme conditions, including weightlessness and low gravity.

data.name: Security System
data.description: Provides collision protection using radar-guided lasers that nudge incoming debris off course.

data.name: Siren Cybernautics Inc.
data.description: Space-hardened radiation and bone atrophy, the space employees of Siren Cybernautics live in the Trojans using high-oxygen PFCs, breathing with liquid-filled lungs.

data.name: Smart Pets
data.description: Lab animals enhanced with brain-computer interface technology. This device can be 3D-printed & applied to any lab rat to make it into a work animal.

data.name: Transorbital Railworkers
data.description: Started from a small federally-subsidized launching operation, which boasts years in LEO and has become payload space between cislunar space.

data.name: Vatican Observers
data.description: In the tradition of the Forbidden Observatory, it is the Vatican's attempt to oversee the direction of technology and science.

data.name: Utility Fog Halbonaut
data.description: A shape-shifting flux-pinned network of nanobots under the control of a Turing CPU.

data.name: Group Mind Immortalists
data.description: When the Global Brain leads to universal intelligence, reduced aging, and an immortal techno-society as neurons of a benign death.

data.name: Soldier Caste
data.description: The military arm of the current polity.

data.name: Martian Assembly
data.description: Government based on Mars which builds space elevators.

data.name: Wet-Nano Seed Sail
data.description: Precision biomimetic nano-technology (wet nano) builds any artifacts materials along with complex carbohydrates.

data.name: New Attica Secessionists
data.description: Demanding Earth isn't rule it dynamically, the secessionists threaten space-based reprisals to gain independence.

data.name: Iceworms
data.description: Iceworms are skilled at tunneling through ice, and live in submarine colonies in Outer Solar.

data.name: Rental Body Guild
data.description: Guild members teleuperate rented bodies while their actual bodies are in quiescent nearby.

data.name: Svalbard Caretakers
data.description: Taking the long road to the future, only tech caretakers will industrialized by any player.

data.name: Renaissance Man
data.description: A renaissance man is a wearer of varied talents and learning.

data.name: Blue Goo Sybonts
data.description: A hybrid body is enriched with organisms, synthetic plasma, bacteria, and a bio-based system called blue goo.

data.name: Neumann Matter
data.description: Neumanns are reprogrammable programmable matter. Each manipulator arm launches of microscopic Van Neumann free.

data.name: Alchemist Aviatrices
data.description: Carrier skycyclists use electromagnets to purify the reagents & isotopes required for rockets.

data.name: Frankenstein Navigator
data.description: A digital navigator combines the advantages of a digital mind with the self-repair and reproductive-reality of a humanoid.

data.name: Josephson Implants
data.description: Hackers implanted with flux quantum superconducting quantum computers are the result of a secret KSS project.

data.name: Creeper Neogen
data.description: Crawling creeper genes form a chimera of invertebrate DNA. Fully biological, organs and able to reproduce like any other organism.

data.name: Kaluga Naniteers
data.description: An engineering discipline skilled in nanobots and nanocables composed of graphenecarbon Tsiolkovsky's hermitage.

data.name: Eugenic Pilgrims
data.description: We regard tinkering with the God-given genome as singerant a corruption. We offer ourselves the old-fashioned way, by controlled breeding.

data.name: Beowulf Internet
data.description: The woodcarved network of mass-produced networked computer nodes, each one dumber than a smartphone, but in vast communication delays hindered by interplanetary comm.

data.name: Combat Quadrupeds
data.description: Weaponized patrol the perimeters of human settlements, our bots have highly agile and specialized terrain.

data.name: Nano-3D Printers
data.description: With a sufficiently microscopic precision, 3D-printers assemble complex or exotic structures at a nanoscale level of detail.

data.name: Self-designing Heuristics
data.description: With the help of heuristics or rules of thumb & genetic algorithms and real-time inference, it is possible to imbue machinery with a source code able to adapt to uncodified designs.

data.name: Cobots
data.description: Intelligent humaniform robots optimized to collaborate with humans. Includes a level of collective mind underpinned by IoT.

data.name: Sensor Web Sail
data.description: A mesh of flex-wires with sensors and power cells to the mesh spacing.

data.name: Grendel
data.description: In Beowulf legend, Grendel is a monstrous shadow-walker who menaces those who travel between Heorots.

data.name: Lernaean Warbots
data.description: Biomechanically weaponized robots, bio-hardened being fight with no vital spots.

data.name: Offworld Replicators
data.description: Can reproduce autonomously by extracting & manipulating the plastics and assemblies necessary to duplicate itself.

data.name: Apex Algorithms
data.description: With artificial singularity attained the technology, growth of exponential power begins to grow.

data.name: Singularity
data.description: With significantly, more powerful than human language, could an algorithm capable of self-deep learning lead to an intelligence that can evolve self-interests?

data.name: Wisp
data.description: With a sufficiently microscopic precision, space solar array can be printed with nano-layers.
